bbs.config.bettertracks.title: BetterTracks
bbs.ui.forms.editors.general.filter_trac: Hide or show tracks for this form
bbs.ui.keyframes.overlays_named_partial: Named %s of %s overlay tracks (not enough overlays)
bbs.ui.keyframes.change_track_color_tool: Select a color for the track
bbs.ui.keyframes.distributed_bones: Distributed %s bones from %s keyframes to overlay tracks
bbs.ui.keyframes.no_bones_distributed: No bones were distributed (no matching overlay tracks found)
bbs.config.bettertracks.auto_select_bone: Automatically selects the bone when you pick a keyframe on a bone track.
bbs.config.bettertracks.auto_select_trac: Automatically selects the bone track when you click on a bone in the viewport.
bbs.config.bettertracks.insert_keyframe_: Creates a new keyframe at the current time when clicking on a bone, instead of selecting the nearest keyframe.
When enabled, creates keyframes on bone overlay tracks when clicking bones. When disabled, always creates keyframes on the main pose track.
bbs.config.bettertracks.local_transform_: When enabled, the transformation mode will be set to local by default.
bbs.config.bettertracks.realtime_keyfram: When enabled and playback is running, transforming a bone will automatically create keyframes in realtime.
bbs.keys.bettertracks.toggle_insert_keyf: Toggle: Insert keyframe on bone click
bbs.config.bettertracks.default_keyframe: Shape used for new keyframes in the timeline.
Color used for new keyframes in the timeline.
